name: Po-Ling Loh
content: Po-Ling Loh Welcome to Po-Ling's website I am a Professor in the Statistical Laboratory in the Department of Pure Mathematics and Mathematical Statistics at the University of Cambridge. I am also a Fellow of St. John's College. My current research interests include high-dimensional statistics, optimization,  network inference,  robust statistics, and differential privacy. I am also interested in statistical applications to medical imaging and epidemiology. Here is a copy of my CV.
